* Helper class to create a conversion function from ByteBuffer to ByteString
 * based on the property
 * {@link OzoneConfigKeys#OZONE_UNSAFEBYTEOPERATIONS_ENABLED} in the
 * Ozone configuration.

* Creates the conversion function to be used to convert ByteBuffers to * ByteString instances to be used in protobuf messages. * * @param config the Ozone configuration * @return the conversion function defined by * {@link OzoneConfigKeys#OZONE_UNSAFEBYTEOPERATIONS_ENABLED} * @see 
ByteBuffer
